rooms.name: Entrance Hall

rooms.description: Adjacent to the living area offering a serene dining experience with open plan flow.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern yet traditional design incorporating local Kerala stone finishes and wood accents, ensuring Vastu compliance by positioning to the South-east.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional bathroom with modern fixtures complemented by traditional tiled flooring.

rooms.name: Service Area
rooms.description: Includes storage and utility space for laundry facilities.

Balcony window providing privacy and natural light.

rooms.name: Study Room / Office
rooms.description: Functional space for work or study with a view of the garden and ensuring balanced energy flow.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom (Convertible)
rooms.description: Optional guest room that can be used as an extra bedroom, designed to maintain Vastu principles with south-east orientation for calm energy.

openings.description: Large window providing ample natural light and cross ventilation in line with Vastu norms.

rooms.name: Balcony Overlooking Pool Area
rooms.description: Elevated balcony providing panoramic views of the swimming pool and landscaped garden. Designed with traditional Kerala-style railings.

openings.description: Panoramic windows ensuring natural light and scenic views.

swimming_pool.description: A modern pool designed with traditional stone accents. Positioned to maintain balance according to Vastu principles.

balconies.description: Spacious balcony offering outdoor space and privacy, aligned with west-facing design.

garden.description: Landscaped garden area integrating water features and native vegetation to enhance tranquility and aesthetic appeal, respecting local building norms.

vastu_considerations.energy_flow: Design ensures balanced energy flow with main living spaces oriented towards the south-east for auspicious entry of positive energies.
vastu_considerations.material_selection: Traditional Kerala materials such as local stone, wood, and clay are used to complement the natural surroundings and maintain regional aesthetics.

building_norms.compliance: Design adheres to Indian residential building codes with emphasis on safety, sustainability, and local traditions.
building_norms.additional_requirements: Inclusion of emergency exits, proper ventilation systems, and accessibility features in accordance with regional guidelines.
